Description: The Long Jump Module allows the player to jump over large distances and gaps and travel at a much faster pace, as well as climb upon slightly higher objects as without it. To use it, walk forwards, begin to crouch (keep running forward) and jump before going fully crouched.

KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: Set name of {{ entname }} so other entities can trigger it. Only 'On' and 'Toggle' trigger use-types are accepted which makes item be picked up by player '!activator'. Kill-targeting this entity will remove {{ entname }} and stop it from respawning.
Entity to trigger when item is picked up. Trigger use-type is 'Toggle'.

Notes: As all weapon-, ammo- and item- entities, this respawns after 15 seconds.

If "Touch only" and "Use only" flags are selected, the item can only be collected by trigger. When those flags are not selected, item also can be collected by trigger, but only if player is the !activator.
